Contents

  • get_path

get_path¶

This module consists of a number of helper functions used to collection of functions to return path for settings, logfile, and data.

microscope_automation.get_path.add_suffix(filePath, suffix)[source]¶

Add suffix to end of file name.

Input:
filePath: path to file name suffix: suffix to put between end of filename and file extension
Output:
newFilePath: filePath with suffix
microscope_automation.get_path.set_pref_file(prefs)[source]¶

Set the preferences file location for the application during runtime TODO: This should be an object :param prefs: file location :return:

microscope_automation.get_path.get_valid_path_from_prefs(prefs, key, search_dir=True, validate=False)[source]¶

Read list of paths from prefs and return first valid match.

Input:

prefs: Dictionary with preferences

key: key for pathlist in preferences.yml

search_dir: if True search for directory, otherwise for file

Output:
return_path: path to valid file or directory
microscope_automation.get_path.set_up_subfolders(parent_folder_path, subfolder)[source]¶

Set the Subfolders for imaging folder - eg. TapeOnly and Failed QC

Input:
parent_folder_path: Image Folder Path subfolder: folder to create, can be list of multiple folders
Output:
sub_folder_path: full path of subfolder
microscope_automation.get_path.get_daily_folder(prefs, barcode=None)[source]¶

Find folder for daily settings and results. Create folder if not existing.

Input:
prefs: Dictionary with preferences barcode: Use the plate barcode to make the folder
Output:
folderPath: path to daily folder. No ‘/’ at end.
microscope_automation.get_path.get_position_csv_path(prefs)[source]¶

Function to get the file path for the csv files where all the positions are stored after segmentation

Input:
prefs: preferences
Output:
return: filepaths for the files
microscope_automation.get_path.get_log_file_path(prefs)[source]¶

Return path to log file.

Input:
prefs: Dictionary with preferences
Output:
logFile: path to log file
microscope_automation.get_path.get_meta_data_path(prefs)[source]¶

Return path for meta data.

Input:
prefs: Dictionary with preferences
Output:
meta_data_file: path to log file
microscope_automation.get_path.get_experiment_path(prefs, dir=False)[source]¶

Return path to experiment.

Input:

prefs: Dictionary with preferences

dir: if true return path to experiments directory, otherwise to experiment file default: False

Output:
experiment_path: path to experiment
microscope_automation.get_path.get_prefs_path()[source]¶

Return path to preferences file.

Input:
none
Output:
prefsFile: path to preferences file
microscope_automation.get_path.get_recovery_settings_path(prefs)[source]¶

Returns the file path to save the pickled dictionary after interruption

Input:
prefs: Dictionary with preferences
Output:
file_path: path to recovery settings
microscope_automation.get_path.get_colony_dir_path(prefs)[source]¶

Return path to directory with .csv file with colony positions and features.

Input:
prefs: Dictionary with preferences
Output:
colonyDir: path to log file
microscope_automation.get_path.get_colony_remote_dir_path(prefs)[source]¶

Return path to directory with .csv file with colony positions and features on network.

Input:
prefs: Dictionary with preferences
Output:
colonyRemoteDir: path to log file
microscope_automation.get_path.get_colony_file_path(prefs, colony_file)[source]¶

Return path to file with colony information typically produced by CellProfiler based on Celigo platescanner data.

Input:
prefs: Dictionary with preferences colony_file: path to .csv file with colony data
Output:
colony_file_path: complete path to colony file
microscope_automation.get_path.get_hardware_settings_path(prefs)[source]¶

Return path to .yml file with microscope specifications from preferences file.

Input:
prefs: Dictionary with preferences
Output:
hardwarePath: path to layout file
microscope_automation.get_path.get_references_path(prefs)[source]¶

Return path to directory for reference images. Create directory if not available

Input:
prefs: Dictionary with preferences
Output:
references_path: path to directory for reference images for specific well
microscope_automation.get_path.get_images_path(prefs, sub_dir=None)[source]¶

Return path to directory for images. Create directory if not available

Input:
sub_dir: Sub-directory for images. Will create folder with this name
Output:
references_path: path to directory for reference images for specific well
microscope_automation.get_path.get_calibration_path(prefs)[source]¶

Return path to calibration information e.g. blackreference images

Input:
prefs: dictionary with preferences
Output:
calibration_path: path to calibration directory
